game_description: This is an interesting VR sports competitive game. You play as a gorilla. The locomotion is inspired by Gorilla Tag. You can run, jump, and hit the ball using only your hands. The rules are the same as volleyball. This game is free, and you can play with other players.
review_1: It’s good but in volleyball the jumping is very inconsistent I would change that, another problem with volleyball is the glitch where you slam the ball down on their side without the game starting yet you should fix that.
review_2: I really like the game, but one thing that could change is the speed of your character. It is very inconsistent and varies. Another thing are glitches, one time whenn i tried joining, other people were spamming the join, and caused them to teleport the ball, and ruin the game.
review_3: The game is well made a little laggy but the players are rude, they don’t wanna be on my team bc I just joined and they all group together to get on littler people so they don’t get any better
review_5: This is one of the best games I’ve played in a while and I hope there will be updates
